data.actual_result: Verified it on my iPad. The top right information always displays unless you're in Light Theme, Landscape. If you're using Portrait Light Theme, the information at the top right changes to black text.
data.expected_result: Text should be shown in the light theme section.
data.short_description: When in landscape mode with Light Appearance, the battery information at the top right is hidden.
data.steps_to_repro: - Login to Discord on a iDevice.- Start with Dark Theme and open a server. You can see the info at the top right is visible.- Change appearance to Light Theme.- Go back to server, swipe right / left and observe the top corners (right on member list, left on channel list)
